li.label: slowpoke
li.description: NAME is always falling behind the group whenever HE goes anywhere.

li.label: fast walker
li.description: NAME likes to be where HE's going. HECAP walks quicker than most people.

li.label: jogger
li.description: NAME always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

li.label: chemical fascination
li.description: NAME has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment. HECAP will consume much more of them, and will sometimes go on hard drug binges. HECAP will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.

li.label: chemical interest
li.description: NAME has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. HECAP will consume more of them, and will sometimes go on social drug binges. HECAP will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs.

li.label: teetotaler
li.description: NAME abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs.

li.label: sanguine
li.description: NAME is just naturally upbeat about HIS situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

li.label: optimist
li.description: NAME is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get HIM down.

li.label: pessimist
li.description: NAME tends to look on the bad side of life.

li.label: depressive
li.description: NAME is perenially unhappy. HECAP has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

li.label: iron-willed
li.description: NAME's will is an iron shield. HECAP keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

li.label: steadfast
li.description: NAME is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

li.label: nervous
li.description: NAME tends to crack under pressure.

li.label: volatile
li.description: NAME is on a hair-trigger all the time. HECAP is the first to break in any tough situation.

li.label: neurotic
li.description: NAME likes to have things squared away. HECAP will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can get the better of HIM.

li.label: very neurotic
li.description: NAME feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. HECAP will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can easily get the better of HIM.

li.label: industrious
li.description: NAME has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

li.label: hard worker
li.description: NAME is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

li.label: lazy
li.description: NAME is a little bit lazy.

li.label: slothful
li.description: NAME loves idleness and hates anything productive. HECAP moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

li.label: psychically hypersensitive
li.description: NAME's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. HECAP is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically sensitive
li.description: NAME's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically dull
li.description: NAME's mind is psychically out of tune with others. HECAP isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

li.label: psychically deaf
li.description: NAME's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. HECAP just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

li.label: careful shooter
li.description: NAME takes more time to aim when shooting. HECAP shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.

li.label: trigger-happy
li.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! NAME just likes pulling the trigger. HECAP shoots faster than others, but less accurately.

li.label: beautiful
li.description: NAME is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to HIM before HE even opens HIS mouth.

li.label: pretty
li.description: NAME has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like HIM.

li.label: ugly
li.description: NAME is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

li.label: staggeringly ugly
li.description: NAME is staggeringly ugly. HISCAP face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at HIM while conversing.
